001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
005import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Contract;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
009import java.util.function.Predicate;
010
011@Contract
012public interface PersistentSubscriber {
013
014    default void init(PersistentSubscriberConfiguration subscriberConfiguration)
015            throws IOException
016    {
017    }
018
019    default Predicate<WithMetadata<ArrayNode>> getFilter() {
020        return wman -> true;
021    }
022
023    void handle(WithMetadata<ArrayNode> eventsWithMetadata, CompletableFuture<Void> result);
024}
